background: The task involves selecting a mix of different food types to purchase in order to satisfy nutritional demands at the minimum cost. Each food type has a set price, and a nutrition matrix detailing the amounts of various nutrients it contains.
constraints: The total amount of each nutrient from all food types must meet or exceed the specific demand for that nutrient
The number of units purchased from each food type is non-negative
objective: Minimize the total price of the foods purchased while meeting the nutritional demands
description: We want to minimize the total prices of the foods to purchase. Each food type has a price, a nutrition matrix that contains the amount of nutrients in each food, and there is a demand for each type of nutrient to be met.

parameters.definition: Number of different types of food
Amount of nutrient m in food k
